Query.Sql: select distinct b.PatientId, a.DiagnosisCode, a.Start_date as event_start_date, a.End_date as event_end_date from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course a left join omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b on a.id = b.id where b.patientid is not null and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%' and a.DiagnosisTableName = 'ICD-10'
